column1: Kata Robata////had a great meal here while visiting Houston. I would like to single out the spicy soy ramen for five stars. I've had ramen at several of the most hyped ramen joints in NY
column2: but this one is one of the best bowls I've had in the US. nutty
column4: not too salty creamy broth. chewy noodles
column5: egg done right with gooey center.
